txt.en: 'My wounds... are severe... but we did not check... this tunnel...'
Dying Soldier
Instance: The Ruthless Dead
Talk to Elfdag in the Paths of the Dead
Hate-fueled Warrior

'Have you come here seeking Elfdag? I ventured beneath the mountain with several of my men, but we ran afoul of the Dead, and only I survived the encounter. I fled the cavernous room where they fell, but I feel no shame for it. It was folly to come here.

'There was a passage we thought to search, in the south-west wall of the cavernous room, but we were set upon before we could venture that way. If you seek Elfdag, that is a good place to begin.

'But wait! Before you go: are you journeying within by yourself, or do you have a Fellowship near at hand? Speak to me again and give me your answer.'
'Do you plan to venture further within by yourself, or do you have a Fellowship near at hand? Speak to me and give me your answer.'
'Well, good luck to you. Tread carefully, for this is a place of great danger!'
You have found Elfdag! He cowers in the court ahead, frightened by the Dead
You have come to the Paths of the Dead in search of Elfhelm's grandson Elfdag, who may have ventured beneath the mountain.
You have proven your persistence to the Dead, and they retreat warily
DNT - Blah!
Waldere has asked if you plan to venture deeper into the Paths of the Dead by yourself or if you have a Fellowship near at hand.
'There is no end to the Dead!'
A great city of the Dead stands beneath the mountains.\n\nYou have found Elfdag in the Paths of the Dead, and now must fight to free him from the Dead.
'This place belongs to the Dead!'
Waldere told you that his men were slain outside of a passage in the south-west of a cavernous chamber, and thinks you should search that tunnel for Elfdag.
'Good luck to you and your friends. Tread carefully, for this is a place of great danger!'
'The Dead will not permit you to pass!'
'This is no place for you!'
'Oh my! You lot are living folk!
Elfdag is in the empty streets of the city of the Dead beneath the mountains.
'This place was made for the Dead. Get thee gone!'
'Begone from this place, mortal!'
'Does that mean you are here to help me?'
'There can be no release for us!'
Fight off the Dead Men and rescue Elfdag
One of Waldere's companions lies here, a victim of the Dead
Some of Waldere's companions lie beside the unsettling stream
'All must die!'
Another of Waldere's companions lies here, his outstretched hand pointing south-west
You see movement in a tunnel to the west... is it Elfdag?
Talk to Waldere
Talk to Waldere and declare your intentions
Waldere is in the tunnel before you, injured and exhausted.
Search the south-west tunnel in the Paths of the Dead for Elfdag
Encounter Skipper Lever
'Oh my!'
'Are you a [placeholder]? Are you here to help me?'
'Watch out! The Dead are everywhere, even if you cannot see them!'
'Is that all of them? It is impossible to say for certain!'

'You are a great adventurer, I can tell! But I think we should leave at once... these Dead Men won't stay away for long, no matter how often they are defeated!\n\n'We will speak once we are above-ground, yes? I overheard some things you will want to know!'
Fallen Soldier
'We should get out of here... and at once!'
